long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Browser Extension for building personalization URLs for your Emails & Chatbots.

🔥 What is Personalizery?

- Personalizery is a WordPress Plugin which allow website owners to Personalize their content withoout writing any code.

🔖 What is Personalized URL?

- A Personalized URL contains tags for personalization which is being fetched by the Personalizery WordPress plugin. This URL can be used when sending Emails also, in Messenger Marketing

⭐ Currently Supported Tags

- Firstname
- Lastname
- Email

🙌 Why this plugin?

- When sending landing page links to your blog readers via Email or Chatbot. You have to build personalized URL. Doing this manually is very hard. With this browser extension, You can easily build with single click of button.

📝 Requirements 

- Current Page URL
- Email Service Provider Name

💯 Support Platforms

- ActiveCampaign
- Automizy
- ChatRace
- Klaviyo
- MailChimp
- MailJet
- MailPoet
- MailerLite
- ManyChat
- Moosend

💅 Features 

- Auto fetching Current Tab URL
- Auto Copy to Clipboard
- Light Weight
